remarks: The orthomodular law.  Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 22.  ( ~ pjoml5 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
omllaw5.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
omllaw5.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
omllaw5.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
omllaw5.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
omllaw5N $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .\/ ( ( ._|_ ` X ) ./\ ( X .\/ Y ) ) ) = ( X .\/ Y ) ) $.
